cards.type: Legendary Creature — High Entia Human Noble
cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text: [i]Chain Attack[/i] — Whenever you attack, if you control three or more tapped creatures, target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

2.2.3: Fusion art gives flash. Now is a 1/5 that sets the toughness of your other creatures to Nia's toughness. Cool goofy buildaround (please don't be busted please don't be busted)
2.3.0: Rework to the boros signpost uncommon. 3 mana 3/3 with chain attack give target creature double strike.

As Noah's Ouroboros enters and at the beginning of each upkeep, you may transform Noah's Ouroboros.
Attacking creatures you control have indestructible.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, exile up to that many target cards from graveyards.
